query.mssql: create table {0} ([ReportSessionId] [varchar](256) NULL, [JobTitle] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [Employee1] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [Department] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [BusinessUnit1] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [DocumentName] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [DocumentLink1] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [SignedResult] [int] NULL)
query.postgres: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {0} ([ReportSessionId] varchar(256) NULL, [JobTitle] citext NOT NULL, [Department] citext NOT NULL, [DocumentName] citext NOT NULL, [SignedResult] boolean NOT NULL)

query.mssql: SELECT Sungero_Company_JobTitle.Name as JobTitle ,Sungero_Core_Recipient.Name as Employee ,dep.Name as Department ,businessUnit.Name as BusinessUnit ,doc.Name as DocumentName ,SignatureType as SignedResult ,SigningDate as SigningDate FROM Sungero_Core_Sign LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient ON Sungero_Core_Sign.Signatory = Sungero_Core_Recipient.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Content_EDoc doc ON Sungero_Core_Sign.EntityId = doc.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Company_JobTitle ON Sungero_Company_JobTitle.Id = Sungero_Core_Recipient.JobTitle_Company_Sungero LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient dep ON dep.Id = Sungero_Core_Recipient.Department_Company_Sungero LEFT JOIN Sungero_Content_EDoc docNOR ON docNOR.BusinessUnit_Docflow_Sungero = Sungero_Core_Recipient.Parent LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient businessUnit ON businessUnit.Id = dep.Parent;

insert into Sungero_Reports_EmployeeSignedDocumentReportV2(ReportSessionId, JobTitle, Employee1, Department, BusinessUnit1, DocumentName, DocumentLink1, SignedResult) values (@ReportSessionId, @JobTitle, @Employee1, @Department, @BusinessUnit1, @BusinessUnit1, @DocumentName, @DocumentLink1, @SignedResult)
